Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 26th overall pick, by Chicago (A) in 1980...
Injured on 7/8/1980 with a Bruised Ribs, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 6/8/1981 with a Stiff Neck, out for 6 days...
Injured on 7/19/1982 with a Strained Groin Muscle, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 9/18/1983, off Brent Strom (OAK)...
Hit first career homerun on 7/11/1984, off Dan Vossler (CLE)...
Traded from Chicago (A) to Chicago (N) on 7/31/1986 (Going to CHC: RF M. Young. Going to CHW: P R. Dibble, P A. Ashby, P T. Ferreira, SS W. Weiss, C N. Santovenia)...
Traded from Chicago (N) to New York (A) on 1/31/1988 (Going to CHC: P B. Smith. Going to NYY: LF M. Young, 3B M. Funderburk, P D. Stieb, P B. Burns, C I. Calderon)...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago (N) on 2/17/1989 to a 3-year deal worth $5,000,000 per year...
Traded from Chicago (N) to New York (N) on 6/16/1990 (Going to NYM: LF M. Young, C J. Owens. Going to CHC: RF C. Smith)...
Traded from New York (N) to Detroit on 6/9/1991 (Going to NYM: P J. Reardon, C G. Williams, P F. Rodriguez. Going to DET: LF M. Young, P R. Anderson)...
